abstract: Additional system resources that a continuous background task can request.
overview:
## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest/Resources] enumeration indicates optional system resources that a specific [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest] instance can request through its [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest/requiredResources] property.

Before requesting a resource, check this property to ensure that the device supports it.

# supportedResources

**Type Property**

Additional system resources that a continuous background task can request.

## Declaration

```swift
class var supportedResources: BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest.Resources { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest/Resources] enumeration indicates optional system resources that a specific [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest] instance can request through its [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest/requiredResources] property.

Before requesting a resource, check this property to ensure that the device supports it.
title: supportedResources
